interactivity.requirements: 35 Ami Lust Choose "Yes" during the event No One Can See Us
interactivity.to_get_this_event: Have 35+ Ami Lust before starting the event chain. Autoplays after " Robin Hood " . This event belongs to an event chain started from " Walk Into The Water " .
interactivity.to_miss_this_event: Have less than 35 Ami Lust before Walk Into The Water , or have chosen "..." during the event No One Can See Us . Replaced by Splat .

progression.synopsis: Ami drags Sensei into a secluded sauna, where she confronts him about his decision regarding Ayane .
trivia: If the Sensei chose '...' during No One Can See Us , a different version of this event will play out. This version of the event cannot be viewed in the Event Viewer.

The intro to this event plays regardless of if the player meets the lust requirement. If they donâ€™t meet the requirement, Sensei will pass out as the heat gets to him. The event will then be counted as missed.

changelog: This Event was added in Update .28.0.
